import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './styles.css'; import logo from "../../img/utils.png"; import { getUserDetails } from '../../../utils/api' import { getPanelUser } from '../../../utils/api' export function PanelUserPage({ history, match, }) { const [user, setUser] = React.useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = React.useState(true) const [userWarns, setUserWarns] = React.useState([]) const [userAutoWarns, setUserAutoWarns] = React.useState([]) const [member, setMember] = React.useState([]) React.useEffect(() => { getPanelUser(match).then(({ data }) => { setUserWarns(data.warnsData) setUserAutoWarns(data.autoWarnsData) setMember(data.userData) setLoading(false) }) }, []) const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) const navSlide = () => { const burger = document.querySelector('.burger'); burger.classList.toggle('toggle') if (open) { setOpen(false) } else if (!open) { setOpen(true) } } function openWindowDiscord() { window.open("https://discord.gg/PaGJGzbzw6", "_blank") } return !loading && (
